title: Emmy Rossum elegant in blouse and maxi skirt with thigh high split at WWD Honors in New York
text:
Emmy Rossum proved just why she is considered one of the most stylish women in Hollywood.

The 33-year-old star looked stunning in a monochrome ensemble as she attended the WWD Honors in New York City on Tuesday night.

She also sported a pair of black strappy heels as she accessorized with dangling earrings.

Showing off: Emmy Rossum proved just why she is considered one of the most stylish women in Hollywood

Her hair was done up in a bun to show off her natural looks which she complemented with minimal make-up including a swipe of pink lip.

This comes just a day after she made a rare solo red carpet appearance at the premiere for Apple TV's The Morning Show.

Rossum, 33, opted for an elegant pale pink trouser suit for the occasion and styled her dark hair back from her face in a sophisticated chignon.

Pretty: The 33-year-old star looked stunning in a monochrome ensemble as she attended the WWD Honors in New York City on Tuesday night

Rocking it: Her hair was done up in a bun to show off her natural looks which she complemented with minimal make-up including a swipe of pink lip

The actress's outfit featured a double breasted jacket that she wore buttoned up and baggy pants tied with excess fabric at the ankle.

She paired the tailored Altuzarra suit with shiny heels and a diamond necklace.

Her makeup included pink eye shadow and dark pink lip color for a coordinated look.

Flare for fashion: Former Shameless star Emmy made a rare solo red carpet appearance the previous night at the premiere for Apple's The Morning Show in New York

Looking good: Rossum, 33, opted for an elegant pale pink Altuzarra trouser suit for the event. The outfit featured a double breasted jacket and pants tied with excess fabric at the ankle

Poised: She paired the tailored suit with shiny heels and a diamond necklace and styled her dark hair back from her face in a sophisticated chignon

Rossum, who is married to Mr. Robot creator Sam Esmail, recently directed an episode of Amazon's new original series Modern Love.

It comes after she helmed two episodes of Shameless, one in 2016 and the other in 2017, as well as an episode of TNT's Animal Kingdom in 2017.

According to her IMDb page, she is attached to play LA icon Angelyne who starred in a series of famous billboards in Los Angeles in the 1980s in a mini series about her life based on an article published in The Hollywood reporter.
